title: Tested On Animals: The Seb Toots Edition - Trailer
description:
Philips and O'Neill are about to launch a new interactive video campaign featuring The Bend, O'Neill team rider Seb Toots and... YOU. For the first time ever, you'll be in the driver seat right in the thick of the action, and making the calls at every turn as Toots - one of the top riders on the TTR World Tour - rides down through the park. 

It all goes live on October 4th. But for a taste of what's to come, check out this short teaser - it's an absolute must. Enjoy
